channel.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2he9bnp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://tinyurl.com/8dnldh6][B]Youtube[/B][/URL] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [URL=http://f2p2006.net/index.php][B]Website[/B][/URL] [img]https://twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=https://twitter.com/F2P2006][B]Twitter[/B][/URL]
This project was started on [b]August 04, 2011.[/b]
[color=red]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b][color=orange]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. [color=green]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.
[b]Latest updates:[/b]
[ul][li]Distance checking [/li][li]Combat bugs [/li][li]Npc definitions
[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]PvP fully complete[/li] [li][color=red]PvN fully complete[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li][color=orange]Equipment requirements[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Every modern combat spell[/li] [li][color=green]Can't mage through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Alching[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Bows/arrows[/li] [li][color=green]Can't shoot through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bones bury-able[/li] [li][color=green]Every prayer working properly[/li] [li][color=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li][color=green]All ores can be mined[/li] [li][color=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li][color=orange]Prospecting[/li] [li][color=red]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li][color=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bars can be made[/li] [li][color=green]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li][color=green]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All fish can be caught[/li] [li][color=green]Big net fishing[/li] [li][color=green]Correct item requirements[/li] [li][color=green]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=red]Moving fishing locations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Picking wheat[/li] [li][color=green]Filling flour bin[/li] [li][color=red]Bread[/li] [li][color=red]Pizza[/li] [li][color=red]Cakes[/li] [li][color=green]Potatoes[/li] [li][color=green]Eating food (in pieces)[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li][color=green]All trees cut-able[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All logs light able[/li] [li][color=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li][color=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=green]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Leather crafting[/li] [li][color=green]Full tanning[/li] [li][color=green]Pottery (fired and unfired items)[/li] [li][color=red]Gem cutting[/li] [li][color=orange]Jewellry making[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All altars working[/li] [li][color=red]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li][color=green]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li][color=green]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All skilling sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Various attacking sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Music on region of player[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li][color=green]Tutorial Island[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23thvsw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/anlh8x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wcijon.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30molco.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zpteg2.png[/img]
Credits: Ranqm Me Delta HALFLIVE 9

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Doobage:

Fishing Shrimp at tutorial island crashes you after fishing your first shrimp.

That was because of something else

Todays work:

  • Cook doesn’t move outside
  • Prospecting from far away doesn’t work
  • Can only talk to npcs when close to them
  • Fixed bug when you are mining and walk away
  • Added sound when smelting a bar in tut island
  • Fixed walking part when made a bar
  • Added sound when smithing bar
  • Fixed so you can click either gate going to
    combat instructor.
  • Fixed text in “These are your comat styles”
  • Fixed it so the bank interface and chatbox interface
    stay open
  • Fixed prayer dude dialogue and sending tabs/interfaces
    much smoother, no more bugs when clicking away.
  • Fixed createarrow to the door and next instructor

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:43, topic:455703”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=558616.msg4086119#msg4086119 date=1345866246]
good updates blake babe
[/quote]

Thanks, expect more tomorrow :rolleyes:. I thought tutorial island would be harder to fix, but I cruised through the bugs pretty fast.

In other news…
This time the server has been running much more smoothly than last time I ran it in December. People are reporting bugs and we are fixing them fully. I don’t have to worry about expenses on server/website costs, so I can keep this running throughout the school year. I will be starting school in 2 weeks, I’m not sure about halflive, but since I’m in 10th grade it won’t be too hard, so I will be able to continue the amount of progress I am having daily even on school nights. We also will be adding a new developer to the team shortly, who will definitely be a great contribution to the server :)[/quote]

Is it me?

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Didn’t have much time today since I went on a 5 hours hike but I was able to fix half of the bugs posted:

Fixes…

  • Flashing icon above tree stays on login
  • Cut a tree from any location
  • Fixed bug with “you get some logs”
  • Fixed quick dialogue sending with making a fire
  • Added it so you can fish even when
  • Fixed the gate to cook
  • Fixed the npc at fishing, now its the correct npc id
    and only shows the option to “net”
  • Added so you can get extra ingredients from cook
    if you lose yours
  • You can now cook on the range once you get more ingredients
  • Fixed a text problem “navigations” to “navigation”
  • Fixed following, previously disabled to not allow players
    to walk through doors. Now it only stops you walking when the
    other person clicks the door.
  • Fixed the distance bug where it says you are either mining/
    woodcutting, but don’t actually start until you are closer.

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

lostmyphat:

Thank you for the bug reports. The reason why you have to be 1 space before the door is to prevent glitching. Today I will completely go over tutorial island and fix every problem there has been so far. Thanks for posting bugs!

Make them walk to the door and make them open it when they arrive.

Also, make everything give real rs rate, but multiply it by a variable called “EXP_RATE”. This will allow you to keep all skills close to each other.

Example:

public int EXP_RATE = 15; addExp(5 * EXP_RATE, 9);
This would give them 5 experience (let’s say that the real rs rate for Fletching is 5 xp per bow) to the Fletching skill, but multiplied by the experience rate. I recommend doing this because it keeps all skills at equal rates.

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Thank you for the bug reports. The reason why you have to be 1 space before the door is to prevent glitching. Today I will completely go over tutorial island and fix every problem there has been so far. Thanks for posting bugs!

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

joelandjacob:

I like 2006 remakes, but you need to add some pictures.

We have a development thread. If you want pictures take a look there.

I have been busy whole day now for fixing some bugs.
The xp bug ( the xp wasn’t updating because of some code missing) has been fixed. Keep in mind that not all our xp rates are perfectionised and may be coded for us to test of our code was working. We will be busy with fixing the bugs and the xp rates. I thank you for your patience and your bug reports. I do hope you all understand why it’s getting fixed so slowly. As for this moment there are bugs coming up that we have never encountered so we have a lot of work fixing these bugs.

halflive9

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:35, topic:455703”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=558616.msg4085742#msg4085742 date=1345819468]

You should just remove Tutorial Island until you get it working perfectly. I’ve gotten two accounts stuck on there now.

The outside is buggy too. No xp for anything.
[/quote]

I’m stuck and no one wants to help me ):
I think that keeping tutorial island is good for testing the bugs. This is the first stage of were the game is brought to the public. There are a lot of bugs and glitches and we’re working on it. I know there’s a bug with the skill levels update. I’m still looking to fix that.

And where exactly are you stuck?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [2006] F2P2006 RS remake [2006]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

You should just remove Tutorial Island until you get it working perfectly. I’ve gotten two accounts stuck on there now.
[/quote]

The outside is buggy too. No xp for anything.[/quote]

I think that keeping tutorial island is good for testing the bugs. This is the first stage of were the game is brought to the public. There are a lot of bugs and glitches and we’re working on it. I know there’s a bug with the skill levels update. I’m still looking to fix that.

And where exactly are you stuck?

Read full topic
